definition: see 刀山火海[dao1 shan1 huo3 hai3]

not to refuse to (idiom)/not to hesitate to
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
ten thousand deaths will not prevent me (idiom); ready to risk life and limb to help out

the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
to offer one's life in sacrifice
bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils

lit. to open one's liver and drip gall (idiom); wholehearted loyalty
